means: 乌姆杜尔曼（苏丹中部城市）

sentence.Network_en: Omdurman in the gold market, the most eye - catching is that many large high value of gold.
sentence.Network_cn: 在恩图曼黄金市场上, 最为引人注目的是那许许多多价值高昂的大件金饰.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2007年3月22日 -  针对第一次工业革命时期的军事变革,布特举了英国在苏丹的乌姆杜尔曼(Omdurman)战役和日俄战争为例,后者让日本在经过几十年的维新后从一个殖民地国家.
omda 乌姆达, omdurman 恩图曼, omds 眼动障碍

means.word_mean: 1. a city of Sudan; located in the central Sudan on the White Nile opposite Khartoum
2. a battle (1898) in which an English and Egyptian army under Kitchener defeated the Sudanese

auth_sentence.content: Tension increases between Sudan and Chad after Darfur rebel group mounts raid on Omdurman, Khartoum's twin city across the Nile.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tension increases between Sudan and Chad after Darfur rebel group mounts raid on Omdurman, Khartoum's twin city across the Nile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tension increases between Sudan and Chad after Darfur rebel group mounts raid on Omdurman, Khartoum's twin city across the Nile.
